alert.note: Alert for Grant (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 2:25PM CDT until June 15 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Grant County in southwestern Kansas... * Until 315 PM CDT. * At 225 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ulysses, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ulysses. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
